titles.title: Code-FLEX Act of 2015
Coding Flexibility in Healthcare Act of 2015
To provide for a safe harbor period for the transition from the ICD-9 to the ICD-10 standard for health care claims.
Code-FLEX Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: This bill requires that health care claims submitted with ICD-9 codes (the code set currently used in health care transactions to identify diagnoses and procedures) continue to be paid during the transition from the ICD-9 code set to the ICD-10 code set.
